subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Hindi is the official language of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में हिंदी के अंतराल्यांचे नाम शीर्षक उपाध्यान दिलें।
राजस्थान में हिंदी के अंतराल्यांचे नाम शीर्षक उपाध्यांचे नाम दिलें।

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the largest industry in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Agriculture is the largest industry in Rajasthan.
